snippet: The woman, whose attack was said to have occurred outside a processing center for asylum seekers on the island of Nauru, had sought an abortion in Australia.
abstract: Australia grants visa to pregnant Somali woman who claims she was raped while detained on island of Nauru, where asylum seekers arriving by boat are held until their applications are processed; woman requested to come to Australia to have abortion, which Nauru prohibits; medical professionals and activists decry conditions at detention center.
lead_paragraph: The woman, whose attack was said to have occurred outside a processing center for asylum seekers on the island of Nauru, had sought an abortion in Australia.

headline.main: Pregnant Asylum Seeker Who Said She Was Raped on Nauru Is in Australia for Care
headline.print_headline: Pregnant Asylum Seeker Who Says She Was Raped Enters Australia for Medical Care

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
